diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@
+if (__GEMMLOWP_INCLUDED)
+  return()
+endif()
+set(__GEMMLOWP_INCLUDED TRUE)
+
+if (NOT USE_GEMMLOWP)
+  return()
+endif()
+
+##############################################################################
+# gemmlowp is built together with Caffe2 Int8 ops
+# By default, it adds include dir from third-party/gemmlowp submodule.
+# Define GEMMLOWP_INCLUDE_DIR to build with a different version.
+##############################################################################
+
+##############################################################################
+# (2) Anything but x86, x86-64, ARM, ARM64 - unsupported
+##############################################################################
+if(CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR)
+  if(NOT CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR MATCHES "^(i686|x86_64|armv5te|armv7-a|armv7l|aarch64)$")
+    message(WARNING "gemmlowp is not supported on ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR} processors. "
+      "The only supported architectures are x86, x86-64, ARM, and ARM64. "
+      "Turn this warning off by USE_GEMMLOWP=OFF.")
+    set(USE_GEMMLOWP OFF)
+    return()
+  endif()
+endif()
+
+##############################################################################
+# (3) Android, iOS, Linux, macOS - supported
+##############################################################################
+
+if (ANDROID OR IOS OR ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME} STREQUAL "Linux" OR ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME} STREQUAL "Darwin")
+  message(STATUS "Brace yourself, we are building gemmlowp")
body: We are not actually building gemmlowp, so better remove this message :)
body_html: We are not actually building gemmlowp, so better remove this message :)
body_text: We are not actually building gemmlowp, so better remove this message :)
